synopsis.text: Meanwhile, on Shimoji Island, Mikaze and her companions find themselves in an unexpected predicament after a puzzling failure in the Comet Blaster exams. As they return to their former base, they are greeted with new responsibilities as instructors for a fresh batch of Meteor Sweeper trainees. But as the Earth braces for an incoming comet barrage, the enigmas surrounding the Cosmic Emergency Management Agency and the alien parasites start to unfold, hinting at a potential internal threat. Join Mikaze and her friends as they navigate the complexities of their new roles, the looming comet menace, and the deepening mystery that could shake the very foundation of their organization.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
